mean_cn: n.手势，姿势；  v.做手势，用动作示意
mean_en: a movement of your body (especially of your hands and arms) that shows or emphasizes an idea or a feeling
sentence: The girl believes that this gesture can bring her good luck.
sentence_trans: 女孩相信这个手势能带来好运。
word_etyma: gest带来，产生 + ure名词后缀 → 带来信息的动作 → gesture手势
